titles: By the King. A proclamation for quieting possessions
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: printed by Christopher Barker and John Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehal the first day of June, 1660. and in the twelfth year of our reign.
Steele notation: Scotland whilest often; Arms 23.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
